```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyverse)
library(tidymodels)
library(parsnip)
library(patchwork)
library(plotly)
library(widgetframe)
library(naniar)
library(mice)
data <- read.csv('MICD.csv')
```

```{r descriptive-analysis, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE}

superdata <- data

# Creating AGE_GROUP; Recoding SEX; Removing missing data over 25%, then all complications except relapse
superdata <- superdata %>%
  mutate(AGE_GROUP = case_when(AGE >= 25 & AGE <= 34 ~ '25-34', AGE >= 35 & AGE <= 44 ~ '35-44', AGE >= 45 & AGE <= 54 ~ '45-54', AGE >= 55  & AGE <= 64 ~ '55-64', AGE >= 65 & AGE <= 74 ~ '65-74', AGE >= 75 & AGE <= 84 ~ '75-84', AGE >= 85 ~ '85+')) %>%
  mutate(SEX = case_when(SEX == 0 ~ 'Female', SEX == 1 ~ 'Male')) %>%
  relocate(AGE_GROUP, .after = AGE) %>%
  select(- c(IBS_NASL, KFK_BLOOD, S_AD_KBRIG, D_AD_KBRIG, NOT_NA_KB, LID_KB, NA_KB, FIBR_PREDS, PREDS_TAH, JELUD_TAH, FIBR_JELUD, A_V_BLOK, OTEK_LANC, RAZRIV, DRESSLER, ZSN, P_IM_STEN, LET_IS))

superdata_admission <- superdata %>%
  select(- c(R_AB_1_n, NA_R_1_n, NOT_NA_1_n, R_AB_2_n, NA_R_2_n, NOT_NA_2_n, R_AB_3_n, NA_R_3_n, NOT_NA_3_n))

superdata_stay <- superdata %>%
  select(c(R_AB_1_n, NA_R_1_n, NOT_NA_1_n, R_AB_2_n, NA_R_2_n, NOT_NA_2_n, R_AB_3_n, NA_R_3_n, NOT_NA_3_n))

# Imputing data to get rid of missing data
imputation_model <- mice(superdata, m = 1, method = "pmm")
imputed_data <- complete(imputation_model, action = "long", include = TRUE)

```

# Bar Plot for Age Group by Gender
superdata %>%
  drop_na(AGE_GROUP) %>% # Remove NAs
  ggplot(aes(x = AGE_GROUP,
                        fill = SEX)) +
  geom_bar() +
  labs(x = 'Age Group',
       y = 'Count',
       fill = 'Gender',
       title = 'Age Group by Gender')
